name: Bulbs.
description:
An activated bulb tries to get to a very important socket, all while "fitting in" to avoid getting caught.

As the game goes on, this activated bulb gains more abilities, allowing it to dash and eventually knock over opposing bulbs.

This game was made in two weeks for the Curdle Game Jam 2021-2022. 

It's not an infinite runner and even has multiple endings!

It runs on mobile (barely), but it's really slow and doesn't really give the intended experience. Playing it on a computer is highly suggested.
